page.title: Has group breaks
page.description: The Has group breaks property specifies if the list should be divided into groups.

section.note: This is a server-side group break. Instead of defining server-side group breaks, you can also define client side group breaks. One advantage of client-side group breaks is that client-side group breaks support multiple levels of grouping. To define client-side group breaks, go to the 'List Properties' pane.

section.description: In practice group breaks look a lot like titles. However, unlike titles, a group is defined by existing data. Here is an example of three group breaks based off of data from a field named 'Code'.

figure.title: The Code Field defines each group break
